title: 'Can I reclaim inheritance tax on my father's shares now that the value has fallen?'
text: 'Can I reclaim inheritance tax on my father's shares now that the value has fallen?' Ask an Expert: There is a way to reclaim IHT within a strict time limit There is a straightforward process to follow to reclaim any overpaid inheritance tax. Photo: ALAMY
